items.value: its time for real Business my friend!

nice to see you again Bro!

Now that you have a lot of experience, it's time for business!
I will help you build your own grow business.
Take the following things you will need:
1x Civilsation plot
5x Cannabis Seed

You also need Fertilizer, you can buy it!
I'll give you Little Chemical People (book) later.
wait, i need to check my Inventory first!
Great, i have two free Slots inside my Inventory!

Welcome to the world of growing!

You can also grow other things but the cannabis seeds will of course bring you the most money in the end. Get Fertilizer and start your first try.

As soon as you have success come to me with the final product!
sounds illegal, may i dont come back!
